title: How to Make a Face Changer on Roblox

steps.headline: Log into Roblox, and click Develop.
steps.description: Click "Edit" on any of your existing places or create one.

steps.headline: Once you get in Roblox Studio, go to "View" and open "Toolbox Objects," "Basic Objects," and "Explorer."
Spawn a Face Changer into the Workspace.
steps.description: You can color any color you'd like but it's recommended to keep it yellow to see the face image properly.

steps.headline: Go to the Toolbox and click "Search."
steps.description: Under "Search," there should be a grey rectangle that says "Models" with a small arrow next to it. Click the arrow and something like this should pop up. Click "Decals."

steps.headline: Once you've clicked "Decals" images should have appeared.
steps.description: Search "Faces" to find something for your Face Changer. If you can't find anything you like, just simply go to the Catalog and find the name of a face you like. Some people have edited the faces and made them something entirely new.

steps.headline: Once you find a decal you like, put it on your Face Changer, and you're all done!
steps.description: Just save and publish to your friends or add to a set. If you make many Face Changers, you can put them together, group them,and make one big Face Changer model everyone will be sure to love.

text: Log into Roblox, and click Develop. Click "Edit" on any of your existing places or create one. Once you get in Roblox Studio, go to "View" and open "Toolbox Objects," "Basic Objects," and "Explorer."  Spawn a Face Changer into the Workspace. You can color any color you'd like but it's recommended to keep it yellow to see the face image properly. Go to the Toolbox and click "Search." Under "Search," there should be a grey rectangle that says "Models" with a small arrow next to it. Click the arrow and something like this should pop up. Click "Decals." Once you've clicked "Decals" images should have appeared. Search "Faces" to find something for your Face Changer. If you can't find anything you like, just simply go to the Catalog and find the name of a face you like. Some people have edited the faces and made them something entirely new. Once you find a decal you like, put it on your Face Changer, and you're all done! Just save and publish to your friends or add to a set. If you make many Face Changers, you can put them together, group them,and make one big Face Changer model everyone will be sure to love.
